xacml3:AttributeAssignmentExpression.xacml3:AttributeValue: Policy Violation: Your project is lacking VM.NoLimitCPU or VM.NoLimit tag to provision VM with more than 2 cores.
Policy Violation: Your project is lacking VM.NoLimitDisk or VM.NoLimit tag to provision VM with disk over 10GB.
Policy Violation: Your project is lacking VM.NoLimitRAM or VM.NoLimit tag to provision VM with more than 10GB of RAM.

Policy Violation: Your project is lacking Net.NoLimitBW tag to request links with bandwidth over 10Gbps.
